name: Pig Dungeon
description:
Small platform game where you have to reach the other door to pass to the next level, on the way there are enemies and boxes that can drop diamonds or extra lives.

The controls are W,S,A,D,  F to open doors and mouse click to attack.

Assets: 

https://lucky-loops.itch.io/ultimate-ui-pixelart-icons

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs
